nodes.text: Gregor Lojan was a male Balosar who was a spy in the Rebel Alliance's intelligence branch. During the Galactic Civil War, he was on the Ring of Kafrene where he managed to steal Imperial data. Lojan was caught by Agent Kav Poen, although Lojan was able to receive his escape opportunity by a high-level Rebel operative posing as an Imperial Security Bureau major.
